definition: to diffuse light/see also 散光[san3 guang1]
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: People with a high degree of farsightedness along with astigmatism have less predictable results.
sentences.chinese: 對遠視兼散光的人手術後結果的預期較少。

sentences.english: To study effect of 3 kinds of Incisions on early astigmatism after cataract surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究3種白內障手術切口對術後早期散光的影響。

sentences.english: A comprehensive optometric examination will include testing for astigmatism.
sentences.chinese: 綜合電腦驗光檢測包括了對散光的檢測。

sentences.english: The results of this paper can provide some reference for the development of the low threshold, high-precision stray light measurement system.
sentences.chinese: 爲低閾值，高精度雜散光測量系統的研製奠定基礎。

sentences.english: Most people have some degree of astigmatism.
sentences.chinese: 大多數人都有一定程度的散光。

sentences.english: And these lenses do not correct serious astigmatism.
sentences.chinese: 而且這種眼鏡也無法矯正嚴重的散光。

sentences.english: Have the nearsighted patient of astigmatism, can you adorn invisible glasses?
sentences.chinese: 患有散光的近視患者，能佩戴隱形眼鏡嗎？

sentences.english: It was true, I'm severely nearsighted with and astigmatism to boot.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，我又嚴重的近視，還有散光。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between oblique astigmatism and refractive cyclophoria.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲證實斜軸散光會引起光學性旋轉隱斜。

sentences.english: New astigmatism caused by wrinkling in the corneal flap or other flap complications.
sentences.chinese: 由角膜瓣褶皺所造成的散光或其他角膜瓣的併發症。

sentences.english: Astigmatic dials are targets used for the detection and correction of astigmatism.
sentences.chinese: 散光盤是用於輔助檢測並矯正散光的視標。

sentences.english: Unpolarized light would be utilized fully, without enlargement of the illuminated area.
sentences.chinese: 散光將被充分利用，無需擴大照明面。

sentences.english: Maybe you fall asleep in class because of uncorrected astigmatism.
sentences.chinese: 也許你在課堂上睡覺是因爲你的眼睛散光。

sentences.english: Astigmatism can occur in addition to nearsightedness and farsightedness.
sentences.chinese: 散光可發生在除近視和遠視。

sentences.english: Astigmatism frequently occurs with other vision conditions like nearsightedness (myopia) and farsightedness (hyperopia).
sentences.chinese: 散光和近視還有遠視一樣，都是常見的眼部疾病。

sentences.english: To evaluate differences on astigmatism in corneal topography and mydriatic optometry.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察角膜地形圖儀與散瞳驗光測得的散光差異。

definition: number of degrees/reading (on a meter)/strength (alcohol, lenses etc)
dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
